Growing Home Service Businesses

About Me

I'm Paul Silva, a dedicated digital marketing consultant specializing in helping home service businesses thrive online.

With years of experience working with contractors, roofers, pressure washers, and other service professionals, I craft comprehensive digital marketing strategies that drive real results and measurable growth.

My approach combines organic SEO, paid advertising, social media marketing, and email campaigns to create a powerful marketing ecosystem that generates consistent leads and grows your business.

I understand the unique challenges home service businesses face and create tailored solutions that connect you with customers who need your services most.

Home Service Marketing Expertise

My digital marketing experience spans across all major channels - from SEO and Google Ads to Facebook advertising and email marketing. I specialize in creating integrated campaigns that maximize ROI for home service businesses. Whether you're a contractor looking to dominate local search or a service company wanting to scale through paid advertising, I deliver strategies that work.

Digital Marketing Tools & Platforms

Google Ads & PPC

Create and optimize pay-per-click campaigns to drive immediate leads and maximize return on ad spend.

SEO & Local Search

Optimize websites for search engines and local visibility using tools like Ahrefs, SEMrush, and Google Search Console.

Social Media Advertising

Develop targeted Facebook and Instagram ad campaigns to reach homeowners in your service area.

Email Marketing

Build and nurture customer relationships through strategic email campaigns and automated follow-up sequences.

Analytics & Tracking

Monitor campaign performance and ROI using Google Analytics, conversion tracking, and custom reporting dashboards.

Landing Page Optimization

Create high-converting landing pages and optimize user experience to maximize lead generation.

Improve your Google Maps Ranking

Improving you Google maps ranking increases traffic and quote calls to your business since customers tend to choose the first listing

Before

Using SEMRush to show Local Map Tracking. We can see how in 08/12/2024 this site was with an average ranking for the key phrase "pressure washing near me" at 14.09 in the county of Los Angeles.

14.09
Average Ranking
08/12/2024

After

With Local SEO, On Page SEO and Link Building applied. Now by 12/01/2024 the ranking for the same phrase is now 5.92 in Los Angeles. Technical SEO was applied also to improve site loading speed. Resulting in this site ranking 1st in many cities of Los Angeles.

5.92
Average Ranking
12/01/2024
Ranking Improvement: From 14.09 to 5.92 (58% improvement)
